about_the_game:
Get off on the right foot with the Starter Bundle for Orcs Must Die! Unchained. With enough gold and skulls to topple an ogre, you can begin to build out your collection of traps and heroes in no time!

Bundle Includes:

• 2750 Gold
• 16,000 Skulls
• 1 Week Battle Pass – 25% XP Bonus, Double Skull Rewards, 5% Teammate XP Bonus, Special Avatar Badge
• Over 50% savings
detailed_description:
Get off on the right foot with the Starter Bundle for Orcs Must Die! Unchained. With enough gold and skulls to topple an ogre, you can begin to build out your collection of traps and heroes in no time!

Bundle Includes:

• Over 50% savings

name: Orcs Must Die! Unchained - Starter Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo 2.66GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
